author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
Several modifications to enable simultaneous simulation of central detector and forward detectors, PPS and ZDC based on #30575:
   1) return back time limit for very forward tracks
   2) introduced flag of very forward simulation
   3) exclude beam particles from central particle simulation  
   4) code clean-up

This PR change simulation histories, no regression expected.
